text: * Starts with DECLARE and ends at BEGIN * This example prompts the user twice, once for each substitution variable. * There are also some local variables. DECLARE V_StaffPaid B2_STAFF.STAFF_NORTYPE:='&Staff No'; V_CustId B2_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER IDYTYPE:='&Customer_Id'; v_custint integer; v_cordno integer; v_staffint integer; BEGIN
